scripts.build: rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && near dev-deploy res/rtb_contract.wasm
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:rs && npm run test:integration:ts-workspaces
scripts.test:integration:rs: npm run build && npm run postbuild && cd integration-tests/rs && cargo run --example integration-tests
scripts.test:integration:ts-workspaces: npm run build && npm run postbuild && ava --verbose integration-tests/ts-workspaces/main.ava.ts
scripts.test:integration:ts-testnet: npm run build && npm run postbuild && ava --verbose integration-tests/ts-testnet/main.ava.ts
scripts.test:ts-workspaces-with-build: npm run build && npm run postbuild && ava --verbose integration-tests/ts-testnet/main.ava.ts
scripts.test:ts-tn: npm run build && npm run postbuild && yarn run ts-node-dev integration-tests/ts-testnet/main-test.ts
scripts.test:ts-tn-web: npm run build && npm run postbuild && yarn run ts-node-dev integration-tests/ts-testnet-web/main-test.ts
scripts.test:ts-sandbox: npm run build && npm run postbuild && yarn run ts-node-dev integration-tests/ts-workspaces/main-test.ts
